extendedInfo.description: Note: For some reason TC doesn't work well with some Samsung phones/tablets.Seamlessly control your Android phone or tablet with Windows keyboard and mouse! FREE VERSIONInstructions: * Go to droidcontrol.com and download and run TakeControlLite.exe on your Windows PC; * Enter IP address and press Connect; * Simply move your mouse cursor to the edge of the screen to make it "jump" on your phone. * Enjoy comfortable typing!Limitations compared to full version: * no clipboard sharing * no support for foreign keyboards (only US) * no auto-connect feature * no encryption * no cursor settings * no auto keyboard release on timeoutNote: This application requires ROOT access to your phone to install driver for the virtual device.

reviews.title: Screen invert problem - Prestigio pmp5080cpro tab
reviews.comment: App seems working but the only problem I have is inverted screen for 90 degrees to the left. Actually screen doesnt look inverted but when I move the mouse to the top-left corner - i am selecting \"Menu\" instead of Google search. Same thing happens for the bottom 3 buttons. if i move cursor to bottom-right, im selecting \"Back\" button.
reviews.author: Nikola R

reviews.title: Great concept but doesn\'t work on my note2
reviews.comment: I would pay good money for this functionality.  I was really excited to beable to use this but in portrait only the top half of the screen is clickable.  In landscape only have the screen is clickable and to scoll up and down you move left to right.
reviews.author: ryan solomon

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This is a very good app that I have lookig for, however there are a couple of problems that I would like to address.  Latency: Both the mouse and keyboard have a slight delay, whitch is indeed to be expected due to the reason that the comands are bing transmited through WiFi.  Connection keeps dropping: Sometimes when I am typing or trying to control the device the connection will drop and give focus back to the desktop making the device repeat characters.  Repeated Characters: As I stated above sometimes the app will repeat characters whilst i am trying to type.  I am aware that some of these bugs may be fixed in the full version of the app.  This some of these bugs may also be due to my hardware as I am using a samsung galaxy note 10.1 and wireless Keyboard
reviews.author: Aaron Fitton

reviews.title: Great idea, works good. Awesome potential.
reviews.comment: The idea is awesome, the practicality is awesome, the app itself is awesome, that is when it works. It seems to like to disconnect and reconnect randomly, and more could be had on the PC end i.e. a visualization of the phone\'s screen for things like technical assistance, but when it works, this is amazing
reviews.author: Wyatt B

reviews.title: Does not work for me
reviews.comment: I have the program running on my pc. I know the ip but my nexus 7 keeps saying \"No reply\"

reviews.comment: Controls could be smoother and I am unable to use navigation bar buttons. But still really good app.
